materials_name: albumen (egg white protein) albumen paper paper (fiber product)
physical_appearance: This is a photograph of Poplar Avenue in Kashmir. There is a wide path, lined with tall poplar trees on either side. There are four individuals seen in the photograph. Two of them are on the right in the foreground. The other two individuals are in the middle of the path, in the center of the photograph. The title is written at the bottom, below the photograph.
title_text: Photograph album of views and portraits in the Punjab, Cashmere, Ceylon, Burma, Penang, Singapore, and Java Poplar Avenue, Kashmir
